Butterworth Filter

Source: R/07-filter.R
filter_bw.Rd

This function computes the cyclical component of the Butterworth filter.

filter_bw(x, ...)

Arguments

x

[univariate vector]

Univariate vector, numeric or ts object with only one dimension.
...

Further arguments passed to bwfilter.

Examples

# \donttest{
x <- cumsum(rnorm(100))
filter_bw(x)
